tools.name: PDF Toolbox
tools.description: Combine, split, rearrange, and edit PDF files with ease. Highlight text, add annotations, and make changes before downloading.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M14 2H6a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v16a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h12a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V8z"></path><polyline points="14 2 14 8 20 8"></polyline><line x1="9" y1="15" x2="15" y2="15"></line></svg>

tools.name: QR Customizer
tools.description: Create custom QR codes for websites, contact information, and more with colors and designs that match your brand. QR Code is a registered trademark of DENSO WAVE Incorporated.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><rect x="3" y="3" width="18" height="18" rx="2" ry="2"></rect><rect x="7" y="7" width="10" height="10" rx="2" ry="2"></rect></svg>

tools.name: Invoice Generator
tools.description: Create professional invoices with your logo, itemized charges, and payment details. Download as PDF or send directly to clients.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><line x1="12" y1="1" x2="12" y2="23"></line><path d="M17 5H9.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 0 0 7h5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 0 7H6"></path></svg>

tools.name: Icon Library
tools.description: Browse, search, and download free icons for your website, presentations, and documents.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><rect x="3" y="3" width="6" height="6" rx="1" ry="1"></rect><rect x="15" y="3" width="6" height="6" rx="1" ry="1"></rect><rect x="3" y="15" width="6" height="6" rx="1" ry="1"></rect><rect x="15" y="15" width="6" height="6" rx="1" ry="1"></rect><circle cx="18" cy="18" r="3"></circle><line x1="20.5" y1="20.5" x2="23" y2="23"></line></svg>

tools.name: Color Palette Generator
tools.description: Design harmonious color palettes with accessibility checking for websites, presentations, and branding projects.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><circle cx="13.5" cy="6.5" r="4.5"></circle><circle cx="7" cy="17" r="4"></circle><circle cx="19" cy="17" r="4"></circle></svg>

tools.name: Password Generator
tools.description: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable length and complexity. Save and manage your passwords locally.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><rect x="3" y="11" width="18" height="11" rx="2" ry="2"></rect><path d="M7 11V7a5 5 0 0 1 10 0v4"></path></svg>

tools.name: Image Resizer
tools.description: Resize, crop, and optimize images for web, email, or social media without quality loss.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><rect x="3" y="3" width="18" height="18" rx="2" ry="2"></rect><circle cx="8.5" cy="8.5" r="1.5"></circle><polyline points="21 15 16 10 5 21"></polyline></svg>

tools.name: Note Keeper
tools.description: Take, organize, and sync notes across devices. Format with markdown and organize with tags.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M12 20h9"></path><path d="M16.5 3.5a2.121 2.121 0 0 1 3 3L7 19l-4 1 1-4L16.5 3.5z"></path></svg>

tools.name: File Converter
tools.description: Convert files between common formats like PDF, DOCX, JPG, PNG, and more without losing formatting.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M17 3a2.828 2.828 0 1 1 4 4L7.5 20.5 2 22l1.5-5.5L17 3z"></path></svg>

tools.name: Calendar Planner
tools.description: Plan events, set reminders, and organize your schedule with a simple drag-and-drop interface.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><rect x="3" y="4" width="18" height="18" rx="2" ry="2"></rect><line x1="16" y1="2" x2="16" y2="6"></line><line x1="8" y1="2" x2="8" y2="6"></line><line x1="3" y1="10" x2="21" y2="10"></line></svg>

tools.name: CSV Editor
tools.description: Edit, format, and analyze CSV files with a spreadsheet-like interface. Sort, filter, and visualize your data.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M14 2H6a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v16a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h12a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V8z"></path><polyline points="14 2 14 8 20 8"></polyline><line x1="16" y1="13" x2="8" y2="13"></line><line x1="16" y1="17" x2="8" y2="17"></line><polyline points="10 9 9 9 8 9"></polyline></svg>

tools.name: Form Builder
tools.description: Create custom forms and surveys with various question types. Collect responses without any monthly fees.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M21 16V8a2 2 0 0 0-1-1.73l-7-4a2 2 0 0 0-2 0l-7 4A2 2 0 0 0 3 8v8a2 2 0 0 0 1 1.73l7 4a2 2 0 0 0 2 0l7-4A2 2 0 0 0 21 16z"></path><polyline points="7.5 4.21 12 6.81 16.5 4.21"></polyline><polyline points="7.5 19.79 7.5 14.6 3 12"></polyline><polyline points="21 12 16.5 14.6 16.5 19.79"></polyline><polyline points="3.27 6.96 12 12.01 20.73 6.96"></polyline><line x1="12" y1="22.08" x2="12" y2="12"></line></svg>

tools.name: Text Formatter
tools.description: Clean, format, and transform text with case conversion, line sorting, and special character removal.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><line x1="21" y1="10" x2="3" y2="10"></line><line x1="21" y1="6" x2="3" y2="6"></line><line x1="21" y1="14" x2="3" y2="14"></line><line x1="21" y1="18" x2="3" y2="18"></line></svg>

tools.name: Screenshot Tool
tools.description: Capture, edit, and annotate screenshots directly in your browser. Share or download in multiple formats.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><rect x="2" y="3" width="20" height="14" rx="2" ry="2"></rect><line x1="8" y1="21" x2="16" y2="21"></line><line x1="12" y1="17" x2="12" y2="21"></line></svg>

tools.name: Markdown Editor
tools.description: Write, preview, and export markdown documents for documentation, blogs, and notes.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M4 6h16a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v8a2 2 0 0 1-2 2H4a2 2 0 0 1-2-2V8a2 2 0 0 1 2-2z"></path><path d="M9 11l3 3 3-3"></path><path d="M12 14V8"></path></svg>

tools.name: Budget Tracker
tools.description: Track income and expenses with categories and visualizations. Export reports and manage budget goals.
tools.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10"></circle><line x1="12" y1="8" x2="12" y2="16"></line><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg>

tools.name: Timer & Stopwatch
tools.description: Set timers and track elapsed time with customizable alarms and interval training features.
